OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAdditionalCapital.label: Other Additional Capital
OtherAdditionalCapital.description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment on Derivatives Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Net of tax effect of the reclassification adjustment for accumulated gains and losses from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges included in accumulated comprehensive income that was realized in net income during the period.

OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLia.label: Other Deferred Compensation Arrangements, Liability, Current and Noncurrent
OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLia.description: Amount of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements classified as other.

OtherDeferredCostsNet.label: Other Deferred Costs, Net
OtherDeferredCostsNet.description: Net amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLoansPayable.label: Other Loans Payable
OtherLoansPayable.description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonrecurring (Income) Expense
OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense.description: Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Other Prepaid Expense, Current
OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.description: Cash paid to purchase assets other than those represented by other elements (securities, loans, mortgages, real estate).

PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets1.label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets
PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets1.description: Amount of cash paid to purchase other assets as part of operating activities.

PaymentsOfDerivativeIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Derivative Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDerivativeIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of a derivative security.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PreconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfCapita.label: Preconfirmation, Current Maturities of Capital Lease Obligations
PreconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfCapita.description: Amount of current maturities of capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

PreconfirmationDeferredFinancingCosts.label: Preconfirmation, Debt Issuance Costs
PreconfirmationDeferredFinancingCosts.description: Amount of debt issuance costs before fresh-start adjustments.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherReceivables.label: Proceeds from Collection of Other Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherReceivables.description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables classified as other.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.description: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

ProceedsFromGrantors.label: Proceeds from Grantors
ProceedsFromGrantors.description: Cash received from grantors during the current period related to operating activities. This element represents receipts from a guarantor for the amount of guarantee provided.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLoans.label: Proceeds from Loans
ProceedsFromLoans.description: Cash received from principal payments made on loans related to operating activities.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets1.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets1.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets as part of operating activities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of tangible or intangible assets used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.label: Pro Forma Weighted Average Shares Outstanding, Diluted
ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.description: The weighted average number of shares or units and dilutive common stock or unit equivalents outstanding in the calculation of proforma diluted earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Disposals
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.description: Amount of divestiture of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligatio.label: Repayments of Debt and Lease Obligation
RepaymentsOfDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligatio.description: Amount of cash outflow for short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueRecognitionSalesReturnsReserveFor.label: Revenue Recognition, Sales Returns, Reserve for Sales Returns

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Percentage
RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.description: Percentage of remaining performance obligation to total remaining performance obligation not recognized as revenue.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SalariesAndWages.label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesAndWages.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership before Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company before stock transaction.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SellingExpense.label: Selling Expense
SellingExpense.description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Additional Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Capitalized Cost
ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.description: The amount by which an asset or assets increased resulting from the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.description: The amount of expense reported during the period resulting from the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.label: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, after forfeiture, of shares or units issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes shares or units issued under employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities, Net of Adjustments
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmount.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmount.description: The carrying value (book value) of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity in Stockholders Equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TreasuryStockDeferredEmployeeStockOwners.label: Deferred Employee Stock Ownership Plan, Issuance of Shares or Sale of Treasury Shares
TreasuryStockDeferredEmployeeStockOwners.description: The issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares to an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseOther.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Other
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseOther.description: Amount of other operating expense of regulated operation.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted EPS.

AirlineRelatedInventoryNet.label: Airline Related Inventory, Net
AirlineRelatedInventoryNet.description: Net carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers and freight.

BadDebtReserveForTaxPurposesOfQualifiedL.label: Bad Debt Reserve, Tax Purpose of Qualified Lender
BadDebtReserveForTaxPurposesOfQualifiedL.description: Amount of bad debt reserves for tax purposes of qualified lenders excluded in calculating deferred taxes.

BridgeLoan.label: Bridge Loan
BridgeLoan.description: Short-Term financing which is expected to be paid back relatively quickly, such as by a subsequent longer-term loan. Also called swing loan or bridge financing.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of consideration transferred, consisting of acquisition-date fair value of assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interest issued by the acquirer.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Cash and Equivalents
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the identifiable assets acquired in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized for assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

CapitalUnits.label: Capital Units, Value
CapitalUnits.description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutur.label: Common Stock, Capital Shares Reserved for Future Issuance
CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutur.description: Aggregate number of common shares reserved for future issuance.

CommonStockDividendsShares.label: Common Stock Dividends, Shares
CommonStockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldAmortization.label: Cost, Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldAmortization.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of intangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.label: Costs and Expenses, Related Party
CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.description: Costs of sales and operating expenses for the period incurred from transactions with related parties.

DebtInstrumentDecreaseForgiveness.label: Debt Instrument, Decrease, Forgiveness
DebtInstrumentDecreaseForgiveness.description: Decrease for amounts of indebtedness forgiven by the holder of the debt instrument.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Compensation Expense
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.

DeferredCompensationEquity.label: Deferred Compensation Equity
DeferredCompensationEquity.description: Value of stock issued under share-based plans to employees or officers which is the unearned portion, accounted for under the fair value method.

DeferredCompensationPlanAssets.label: Deferred Compensation Plan Assets
DeferredCompensationPlanAssets.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of assets held under deferred compensation agreements.

DeferredLongTermLiabilityCharges.label: Deferred Long-term Liability Charges
DeferredLongTermLiabilityCharges.description: The total amount of long-term liability charges that are being deferred beyond one year.

DeferredTaxAssetInterestCarryforward.label: Deferred Tax Asset, Interest Carryforward
DeferredTaxAssetInterestCarryforward.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible interest carryforward.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employers Matching Contribution, Annual Vesting Percentage
DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.description: Percentage of employer's matching contributions to a defined contribution plan that vests in a given year.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

DueToOtherRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurren.label: Due to Other Related Parties, Current
DueToOtherRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurren.description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt.label: Early Repayment of Senior Debt
EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt.description: The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.label: Excess Stock, Shares Authorized
ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.description: Maximum number of excess stock shares permitted to be issued.

FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsClai.label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Claim Liability, Weighted Average Risk Free Discount Rate
FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsClai.description: This element represents the weighted average risk free rate used to discount the claim liability related to financial guarantee insurance contracts.

FlightEquipmentNet.label: Flight Equipment, Net
FlightEquipmentNet.description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements.

GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.label: Gains (Losses) on Restructuring of Debt
GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables arises from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Affiliates, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

LiabilitiesAssumed1.label: Liabilities Assumed
LiabilitiesAssumed1.description: The fair value of liabilities assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Current
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees.label: Noninterest Expense Investment Advisory Fees
NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees.description: This represents the company's cost incurred during an accounting period for managing the money in a fund, which will be billed back to the client and is a component of noninterest expenses.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesPayableToBankCurrent.label: Notes Payable to Bank, Current
NotesPayableToBankCurrent.description: Current portion of the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment with long term maturities. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

OtherInventoryNetOfReserves.label: Other Inventory, Net of Reserves
OtherInventoryNetOfReserves.description: Amount, after of valuation reserves and allowances, of inventory, classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

PrepaidRent.label: Prepaid Rent
PrepaidRent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for rent that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

RepaymentsOfConstructionLoansPayable.label: Repayments of Construction Loans Payable
RepaymentsOfConstructionLoansPayable.description: The cash outflow from repayment of borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

StockDividendsShares.label: Stock Dividends, Shares
StockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.label: Subordinated Borrowing, Interest Rate
SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.description: Stated interest rate of the subordinated debt.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Accounts and Other Receivables, Net, Current
AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties, Current
AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsReceivableSale.label: Accounts Receivable, Sale
AccountsReceivableSale.description: Amount of decrease from sale of accounts receivable.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DividendsPreferredStockStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Stock
DividendsPreferredStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Noncurrent
DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInterest.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Interest
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInterest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits in future periods.

InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrent.label: Interest and Dividends Payable, Current
InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity). Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase, Accrued Interest
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the credit facility for the period.

LoansPayableToBank.label: Loans Payable to Bank
LoansPayableToBank.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

PaymentsOfLoanCosts.label: Payments of Loan Costs
PaymentsOfLoanCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share
PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockPreferredShares.label: Treasury Stock, Preferred, Shares
TreasuryStockPreferredShares.description: Number of previously issued preferred shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsurance.label: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Original Discount Rate, before Cash Flow and Reinsurance
AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsurance.description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and current period update of cash flow assumption, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment, discounted at original rate. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Revenue
BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust, Shares
CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.description: Number of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

CompensatedAbsencesLiability.label: Compensated Absences Liability
CompensatedAbsencesLiability.description: Amount of liability accrued for the employer's obligation related to an employee's right to receive compensation for future absences that have been earned by employee.

ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Issued
ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.description: "The number of new shares issued in the conversion of stock in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesReservedF.label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Reserved for Future Issuance
ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesReservedF.description: Aggregate number of nonredeemable convertible preferred shares reserved for future issuance.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateIncreaseDecrea.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Increase (Decrease)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateIncreaseDecrea.description: Incremental percentage increase (decrease) in the stated rate on a debt instrument.

DeferredCompensationShareBasedArrangemen.label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Current
DeferredCompensationShareBasedArrangemen.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.label: Preferred Stock, Dividend Rate, Percentage
PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.description: The percentage rate used to calculate dividend payments on preferred stock.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership after Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company after stock transaction.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

AccountsReceivableGross.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Recognition and Exercise
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition and exercise of award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedSalaries.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Salaries
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedSalaries.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in accrued salaries.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

MachineryAndEquipmentGross.label: Machinery and Equipment, Gross
MachineryAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of notes payable.

PaymentsForPreviousAcquisition.label: Payments for Previous Acquisition
PaymentsForPreviousAcquisition.description: Cash outflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

ProceedsFromPreviousAcquisition.label: Proceeds from Previous Acquisition
ProceedsFromPreviousAcquisition.description: Cash inflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Shares Outstanding
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The number of shares reserved for issuance pertaining to the outstanding stock options as of the balance sheet date for all option plans in the customized range of exercise prices.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.
